images.imgDescription: obi-Wan Kenobi is a Light Side Jedi Master who trained Anakin and fought him before he turned to Darth Vader.
Anakin Skywalker is a Dark Side Sith Lord formerly a Jedi, destined to become Darth vader.
Padmé Amidala is a Light Side senator and former queen fighting for peace.
Yoda is a wise Light Side Jedi Master and leader of the Jedi Council.
Darth vader is a Dark Side Sith Lord and enforcer of the Emperor’s will.
Mace Windu is a powerful Light Side Jedi Master known for his purple lightsaber.
Count Dooku is a Dark Side Sith Lord and former Jedi who leads the Separatists.
Qui-Gon Jinn was a Light Side Jedi who discovered Anakin on Tatooine.
Palpatine is a Dark Side Sith Lord and manipulative Emperor of the galaxy.
Leia Organa is a Light Side Rebel leader, princess, and sister to Luke Skywalker.
Han Solo is a Light Side Rebel pilot who helped defeat the Empire.
Chewbacca is a loyal Light Side Wookiee warrior and Han Solo’s co-pilot.
Lando Calrissian is a Light Side Rebel and skilled gambler turned hero.
Boba Fett is the GREATEST character in the entire series on everything.
Jango Fett is a neutral bounty hunter and template for the clone army.
Darth Maul is a Dark Side Sith apprentice with a double-bladed lightsaber.
C-3P0 is a protocol droid fluent in over six million forms of communication.
R2-D2 is a resourceful astromech droid who often saves the heroes.
Jar Jar Binks is a clumsy but well-meaning Gungan ally to the Jedi.
General Grievous is a Dark Side cyborg leading Separatist droid armies.
Shaak Ti is a wise Togruta Jedi Master who oversaw the training of clone troopers on Kamino.
Captain Rex is a loyal Light Side clone trooper leader under the Jedi.
B1 Battle Droids are the clumsy yet iconic foot soldiers of the Separatist Droid Army.
Watto is a greedy Toydarian junk dealer who owned Anakin and his mother on Tatooine.
